post.desc:
So, a "[**Toseinin**](https://dic.pixiv.net/a/%E6%B8%A1%E4%B8%96%E4%BA%BA)" is kinda like a wandering gambler during the late Edo period.

These guys just drift everywhere and make a living by gambling. While they were basically hobos and social outcasts, they still had the traveler's dining etiquette â€“ an iconic one being wrapping the fish bones from the fish they were served in a piece of paper, pocketing it, and throwing it away once outside the establishment.

The idea is that you don't leave any waste behind.
